root.cn:
这是一款平板上针对儿童的有趣的交通填色绘画软件， 可以让孩子选择不同的颜色直接在线稿图上涂色，创作出属于自己的美妙绝伦的绘画作品。丰富渐变的颜色，发挥孩子的想象力，让孩子感受绘画及色彩的乐趣 儿童在成长的阶段，外面世界对于他们来说都是新鲜的，好奇心可以让他们对世界万物充满兴趣。而这一点正是少儿绘画的动力源泉。他们喜欢把眼中的新鲜事物通过画笔描绘出来。一个细小的事物，孩子们要通过自己的观察，发现它们更具体的结构组成，更丰富的颜色变化，这样才能把事物最本质和最传神的美描绘出来。这种观察方法也可以大大提高理性思维和逻辑推理能力。
娱乐是小孩子的天性，也是他的权利。没有足够的娱乐，小孩身心不可能健康发展。绘画是他们最喜欢的娱乐方式之一，同时也是最安全、最经济、最高尚、对身心健康最有利的娱乐。
小朋友们拿起你的画笔一起创作美丽的图画吧，图画完成后可以跟爸爸妈妈或者小伙伴们分享，看看谁的画作更可爱更漂亮哦！

我们产品的特点： 1，产品涵盖300多种交通工具图片以及100+颜色选择。 2，绘画可以保存下来，下次可以选择继续作画。 3，图案精美，符合图像式学习的视觉需求，加深记忆 4，我们产品的开发人员本身也是孩子的家长，更加关心孩子的成长，同时我们也请来了育儿专家一起来设计这款应用。
root.en: This is an interesting traffic color painting software for children in the Pad, which allows children to choose different colors to color directly on the online manuscript and create their own wonderful paintings. Enrich the gradient color, give play to children's imagination, let children feel the joy of painting and color. When children are growing up, the outside world is fresh for them. Curiosity can make them interested in all things in the world. And this is the power source of children's painting. They like to paint new things in their eyes by paintbrush. A small thing, the children have to see through their own observation, find their more concrete structure, more colorful changes in color, so that the most essential and the most vivid beauty of things can be described. This observation method can also greatly improve rational thinking and logical reasoning ability. Entertainment is a child's nature and his right. Without enough entertainment, children can not develop physically and mentally. Painting is one of their favorite ways of entertainment. It is also the safest, the most economical, the most noble, and the most beneficial entertainment for physical and mental health. The children pick up your brush and create beautiful pictures. After the pictures are finished, you can share with your parents or the partners, and see whose paintings are more lovely and beautiful.
